data.title: Rod Steiger
data.text:
AKA Rodney Stephen Steiger

Born: 14-Apr-1925

Birthplace: Westhampton, NY

Died: 9-Jul-2002

Location of death: Los Angeles, CA

Cause of death: Kidney failure

Remains: Buried, Forest Lawn Memorial Park Cemetery, Hollywood Hills, CA

Gender: Male

Religion: Lutheran

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: In The Heat of the Night

Military service: US Navy (WWII, Pacific Theater)

Wife: Sally Gracie (m. 1952, div. 1958)

Wife: Claire Bloom (actress, m. 1959, div. 1969, one daughter)

Daughter: Anna Steiger

Wife: Sherry Nelson (m. 1973, div. 1979)

Wife: Paula Ellis (m. 1986, div. 1997, one son)

Wife: Joan Benedict (m. 10-Oct-2000, until his death)

High School: (dropped out at age 16)

University: The Actor's Studio (acting school)

Oscar for Best Actor 1968 for In the Heat of the Night

Golden Globe 1968 for In the Heat of the Night

Hollywood Walk of Fame 10-Apr-1997 at 7080 Hollywood Blvd.

Open Heart Surgery 1976

Cholecystectomy 2002
